Redmine Java API version 1.22 is ready

Nov 7, 2013 â€¢ Author: admin

Today we released Redmine Java API v. 1.22.

Copying release notes from Github:

New features:

    * Issue #102 Users Groups retrieval * Issue #99 added field apiKey to the User bean * Issue #97 Update due date format in writeVersion

Bug fixed:</p>

    * Issue #95 fixed a bug in equals() in CustomField.java

The source code is located on Github.</p>

The binaries and javadoc are available in Maven Central.
